name: travel
definition: When the thrower fails to establish or maintain a proper pivot point

name: double team
definition: When more than one defensive player is within 10 feet of the thrower without guarding another offensive player

name: disc space
definition: When the marker is closer than one disc diameter from the thrower's torso

name: fast count
definition: When the marker counts at intervals less than one second or skips numbers

name: straddle
definition: When the marker's feet are closer than one disc diameter from the thrower's pivot point

name: vision blocking
definition: When the marker deliberately blocks the thrower's vision

name: pick
definition: When an offensive player obstructs a defender's path to the player they are guarding

name: spirit of the game violation
definition: Occurs when actions violate the principles of fair play and respect

name: receiving foul
definition: When contact interferes with a player's attempt to make a play on the disc

name: throwing foul
definition: When there is non-incidental contact between thrower and marker

name: force-out foul
definition: When contact causes an airborne player to land out-of-bounds instead of in-bounds

name: blocking foul
definition: When a player takes an unavoidable position or moves solely to prevent an opponent's path

name: false start
definition: When receiving team players change position after signaling readiness

name: delay of game
definition: When a team takes more time than reasonably necessary to put the disc in play

name: marking violation
definition: Any illegal defensive marking behavior against the thrower

name: stall
definition: Occurs when the thrower fails to release the disc before the marker's count reaches ten.

name: wrapping
definition: Occurs when the marker's arms are less than one disc diameter away from the thrower's torso or pivot.

name: offside
definition: Occurs when players are not in proper position before the pull.

name: dangerous play
definition: Occurs when a player demonstrates reckless disregard for safety.

name: strip
definition: Occurs when a foul causes a player to lose possession of the disc.

name: out-of-bounds
definition: Occurs when a player or disc is out of bounds.
